doc.title: Khoda miad
doc.plot: In a remote village in the North of Iran, in a villager family, the mother is very ill, and everyone in the village lost hope she would recover. The villagers tell the children that only God can help her. One of the daughter writes a letter addressed to God and send it. The letter falls into the hand of a post office employee who tells everyone in the post office about it. They decide to help by sending an ambulance to the village to save the mother.
